room.name: branion plaza
room.short_description: This is the center of campus
room.long_description: Branion plaza, home to the cannon Ol' Jemeriah, marks the center of UoGuelph's campus

room.name: the library
room.long_description: 3 of 5 floors are 'quiet' floors, but don't be fooled...they're always under construction

room.name: rozhanski hall
room.short_description: this is the main lecture hall
room.long_description: beware the jugglers. they've lost grip on reality (but are otherwise very kind)

room.name: the bookstore
room.long_description: you can find the same books for free at the library

room.name: university center
room.short_description: at the UC, you can find food and bus tickets
room.long_description: this used to be a student space, before school admin renovated it for office space

room.name: thornborough
room.long_description: the halls permanently smell of tears, testosterone, and caffiene

item.name: book
item.desc: a fluid mechanics textbook from 1892. it's still relevant
item.action: you read the book. it's uninteresting

item.name: ball
item.desc: a red, plastic ball, presumably belonging to the jugglers
item.action: you throw the ball. now you have no ball.

item.name: HDMI
item.desc: upon further inspection you realize the cable is broken

item.name: textbook
item.desc: a fluid mechanics textbook from 2020. the only new element is the cover picture of the surfer hanging 10
item.action: you read the testbook. it's incredibly uninteresting
